name: get_answer_to_question
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool question_answered.
Tool description: Ask a question and get an answer. Example: When did World War two end? answer -  September 2, 1945
API description: Fetches the answer to a given question from the Question Answered API using the provided RapidAPI key.

questionasked.default: how far away is the sun from earth?
